publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2611# Mr Lloyd Quinan: Appointment of Autism and Asperger's Syndrome Co-ordinators-That the Parliament recognises the on-going problems faced by adults diagnosed with autism and Asperger's syndrome; notes the initiative taken by Lothian Health Board to create an adults with autism co-ordinator, and acknowledges the requirement for similar initiatives to be set up nationally to ensure that this section of society can access services and resources and receive support from experienced and qualified professionals.

S1M-2611# Appointment of Autism and Asperger's Syndrome Co-ordinators (lodged on 15 January 2002) Brian Adam*, Michael Matheson*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Tommy Sheridan*, Fiona Hyslop*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Christine Grahame*, Michael Russell*, Ms Sandra White*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Colin Campbell*
S1M-2611# Appointment of Autism and Asperger's Syndrome Co-ordinators (lodged on 15 January 2002) Fiona McLeod*, Alex Neil*, Robin Harper*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Brian Monteith*

S1M-2611# Mr Lloyd Quinan: Appointment of Autism and Asperger's Syndrome Co-ordinators-That the Parliament recognises the on-going problems faced by adults diagnosed with autism and Asperger's syndrome; notes the initiative taken by Lothian Health Board to create an adults with autism co-ordinator, and acknowledges the requirement for similar initiatives to be set up nationally to ensure that this section of society can access services and resources and receive support from experienced and qualified professionals. Supported by: Brian Adam, Michael Matheson, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Tommy Sheridan, Fiona Hyslop, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Christine Grahame, Michael Russell, Ms Sandra White, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Colin Campbell, Fiona McLeod, Alex Neil, Robin Harper, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Brian Monteith, Cathy Peattie*, Mary Scanlon*, Ms Margo MacDonald*
S1M-2611# Appointment of Autism and Asperger's Syndrome Co-ordinators (lodged on 15 January 2002) Mr Andrew Welsh*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Murdo Fraser*
S1M-2611# Appointment of Autism and Asperger's Syndrome Co-ordinators (lodged on 15 January 2002) Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*, Phil Gallie*
S1M-2611# Appointment of Autism and Asperger's Syndrome Co-ordinators (lodged on 15 January 2002) David Mundell*, Cathie Craigie*, Scott Barrie*
S1M-2611# Appointment of Autism and Asperger's Syndrome Co-ordinators (lodged on 15 January 2002) Bill Aitken*

S1M-2611# Appointment of Autism and Asperger's Syndrome Co-ordinators (lodged on 15 January 2002) Elaine Smith*
S1M-2611# Appointment of Autism and Asperger's Syndrome Co-ordinators (lodged on 15 January 2002) Mr Kenny MacAskill*
S1M-2611# Appointment of Autism and Asperger's Syndrome Co-ordinators (lodged on 15 January 2002) Mr Duncan Hamilton*
